full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA LHA RGYAL PO MCHED DGU'I LA GSHEGS PA GTOR 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA MCHED DGU LA GSHEG GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI DAD DANG LDAN OA GUNG PI LIG THU CHOS RJE BLO GSAL GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AE LA GOG SANG MER GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN DU GNAS PA DANG, ,'GRO BA KUN GYI DBUL PHONGS SEL ZHING TSOGS GNYIS RDZOG TE MTHAR THUGS RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR SHOG ,)
